column15: Quarrying, the extraction of minerals or other geologic materials and subsequent concrete production, are associated with both air and noise pollution in the surrounding region. Community-level threats may include exposure to petroleum hydrocarbons from occasional on-site spills from on-site machinery, although their are no residents within the near vicinity.
